name: The Escape - A Memory Game
description:
How good is your memory? Let's put it to a test.

In this game, you need to escape 10 floors by figuring out which doors will take you down to the first floor and escape the building.

[How to Play]
Place a finger on the screen to enable the joystick that moves the character. Use the joystick to navigate the character and choose a door to enter. The door you choose may take you up one or multiple floors or down a floor. Remember the doors that take you down a floor. How many doors will it take for you to escape the building? How much time do you need?

Challenge friends and family members to see who is better at this escape-memory game!

Visit Quest Monkey Games' official web page at www.questmonkeygames.com or the official Facebook page at https://www.facebook.com/QuestMonkeyGames/ to get the latest news and info about this game.
